00027 namespace Hypertable {
00028   using boost::TIME_UTC;

00032   struct HiResTime : public boost::xtime {
00033     HiResTime(int type = TIME_UTC) { reset(type); }
00034 
00038     bool reset(int type = TIME_UTC) {
00039       return boost::xtime_get(this, type) != 0;
00040     }
00041 
00045     int cmp(const HiResTime &y) const {
00046       return boost::xtime_cmp(*this, y);
00047     }
00048 
00049     bool operator<(const HiResTime &y) const { return cmp(y) < 0; }
00050     bool operator==(const HiResTime &y) const { return cmp(y) == 0; }
00051   };
